name: Welcome to the hell
description:
So, I see you like rage games since you clicked this. Fear not! I won't disappoint you! This is a rage game! Also for all of you noobs there is a easy difficulty.

HARD difficulty features: hidden spikes, hidden turrets, you must walk else you die, more rage, hard boss

EASY difficulty features: visible spikes (don't be a pussy and think that it is the same level layout, you can't cheat), no turrets, longer levels, easier boss (slower spears,  boss has less health), less rage (pls play hard cuz it is funny to watch you rage >:) )

WARNING! Do not rage quit! WARNING!

The game was made in one week by NickDev (nickdev.indie.af) and IKDev (RandomBoi on Discord) for Brackeys GameJam 2021.1

CONTROLS

P1 - WASD to move, E for bomb

P2 - Arrow keys to move, SPACE for bomb
